name: Coin Pusher
description:
Find the most addictive funfair machine and become the new king of Coin Pusher!
The principle is simple, add coins on the deck and drop a maximum of bonuses and gifts into the basket! Dropping coins will allow you to gain levels! Choose from one of the 5 available themes and start your climb to riches!



Features:

■ Different prizes to collect and sell!
■ Many different pieces!
■ 5 different themes with different speed trays!
■ Level system!
■ Coins generator!
■ Good music!
